name: Mom Koser's Crockpot Beef
comments: I serve this over rice with steamed cauliflower
ingredients: sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic powder, paprika, savory
remainder of cup of milk (add to measuring cup containing flour)
instructions: Liberally sprinkle spices on both sides of beef. Brown meat in butter, then place in crockpot. Add water and soy sauce (you may need to add more liquid later if it all boils away). If making the night before, set crockpot to Low and allow to cook all day. If making same day, set on High (cooks approx. 5 hours on this setting).
Whisk flour and milk together until completely mixed, with no lumps. Add to crockpot about 1 1/2 hours before eating; stir contents of crockpot.
